snippet.title: Autumn Wish - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Draw runes to cast spells, explore town, and be gay for your best friend.
The visual novel narrative RPG "Autumn Wish" is available to download now at violetfairy.itch.io/autumn-wish for free!

Inspired by shows like The Owl House, Little Witch Academia, and Cardcaptor Sakura, "Autumn Wish" takes place in a fantasy world where everyone is a witch and magic is shaped by emotions.  Enjoy a cozy adventure, have definitely 100% totally platonic conversations, and be a sapphic disaster in the best way possible.
